website_summaries.verdict: Although this vase may be a bit delicate for some consumers' needs, its appealing looks make it nice as an accent piece or gift.
pros: Features an elegant design with an etched floral pattern that compliments flowers
Stands 17 inches, which is perfect for long stems
cons: Made for faux or dried bouquets, as it will leak if filled with water
Painted finish is prone to chipping or scratching

customer_reviews.title: Didn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today. I needed a tall vase for a rather tall arrangement I made. This one does the trick. Rich colors. Has a homemade look to it. I am really pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MarniTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The base on one side had the black paint all chipped up. There were other parts that were chipped up as well. Disappointed because the vase and colors itself is very pretty.... Quality is poor.
customer_reviews.author: gottaread

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: They (I bought two) are exactly what I expected. Arrived on time and free from scratches or damage. They catch the light nicely and are really very pretty. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mc

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I just love this space it's really really nice I wish I would have gotten it at least two but I think I would order another one definitely it goes with my decor and I get compliments a lot on where did I get it ..
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Harris

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price paid
customer_reviews.text: Weighted bottom, which is a positive, and color is ok. Scratched on two bottom corners and up near the top, but I'm hoping those won't be too easy to see unless up close. In the picture, the colors seemed to blend, but in reality they are clearly separated. It'll do, for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy home deco
customer_reviews.text: This vase looks sophisticatedly rich and is elegantly crafted, yet it's very inexpensive. Bought 2 of them and love how they accentuates my entryway. Love the fact that they're made of steel, so don't have to worry about my kids breaking them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who painted these
customer_reviews.text: The paint job was done by, you know I am not sure, and to compare it to anything would not be far to that person, animal or insect. Good thing I was going to strip them and paint them a different color.
customer_reviews.author: The Great 1

customer_reviews.title: Stay with the metal.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 Hosley vases 3red. on the way. These vases are sturdy, hittable & oh so worth the $. I'm going to collect Hosley products. I recieved one today, ceramic , came in pieces. I'll stick to the metal or wood. While it traveled it was all banged up & broke.☹☹
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Young

customer_reviews.title: love the colors
customer_reviews.text: paint job is sloopy - but you need to pick it up and inspect to really see -- from distance it looks great. these colors brown - orange and red are hard to find so i am lucky to find this. has a High gloss to it and i like that
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: On the fence
customer_reviews.text: This is a really pretty piece. I used it to stage my house to sell. Wouldn’t gift it because it had a lot of places that weren’t painted and really didn’t look of good quality. However the colors are pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Product review
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the bucks. Giving the material, it'll be around for a very long time & it's so unique, as well as stylish for any room.👍
customer_reviews.author: g. galbom

customer_reviews.title: Love it but it’s small for the price
customer_reviews.text: I can use as a gift and sturdiness is good but the value for the money it could be less expensive cause of the size and lightweight I love the colors burgundy, gold, dark green very nice. No dislike. I use it as a flower arrangement in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Lizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice vases
customer_reviews.text: Love these vases! They are exactly what was shown in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda A.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vase and it looks really pretty with the flowers I bought to go with it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Lovely vase for the money. I bought silk flowers to add & it turned out beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a birthday gift. It arrived quickly, but when I opened the box I was immediately disappointed. The vase looked like it was painted by a child. There were unpainted spots on the neck, body, and the base of the vase. I knew immediately that I could not gift this item. I love the height and size of the vase. Unfortunately, the paint quality is very poor and the item was quickly returned.
customer_reviews.author: shadall

customer_reviews.title: In love with my vase
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a year still looks new absolutely a stunning piece
customer_reviews.author: Kushondra D Willis

customer_reviews.title: If you looking for a smaller vase than this is the one.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color I just thought that they where bigger and wider then what they were but that's my fault for not getting a good understand of the measurements. I was looking for bigger to sit on my floor had the right color I was looking for beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: Even more beautiful than the picture. Looks expensive. Fits perfect in my living room. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: S&T

customer_reviews.title: Defected
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful vase. It has a good weight & beautifully designed. My issue was mine came with the paint smeared and running down the vase. It also had dents and scratches. I hate returning things especially something I was looking forward to arriving.
customer_reviews.author: jade paalan

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my sister and she absolutely loved it! The quality is great for the price you pay!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Vases
customer_reviews.text: These are on headstones in the cemetery , and they look beautiful. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition
customer_reviews.text: Luv this vase ... Just as pictured ... And a beautiful addition to burgundy & gold decor in my living room
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Russell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love it more in my living room that in the picture I only wish it came in other colors, I am planning to gift these out
customer_reviews.author: Sydney fraser

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price. Wish it was about 3 to 5 inches taller.
customer_reviews.author: Althiea Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Sturdy enough to hold a big bouquet of artificial flowers. The colors are not perfect, but you can’t tell if you are not looking closely.
customer_reviews.author: Alena

customer_reviews.title: I can't understand the Amazon choice on a poor quality item?
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the quality and packaging of the product, missing paint, dust as if it was on a shelf for years and only had one bubble to seperate the two items and not individually wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Thomas

customer_reviews.title: craftsmanship=poor
customer_reviews.text: damage when arrive. maybe the shipping box was too small. craftsmanship poor. amazon refund in full.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this beautiful vase to replace a broken one and I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: Smh
customer_reviews.text: Horrible small vase i wanted a big one then yall use the fit in your room thing and even thats a lie
customer_reviews.author: precious pittman

customer_reviews.title: The vase should go well in any room.
customer_reviews.text: The vase should go well in any room. The colors melt gracefully on this vase and will gel in any environment
customer_reviews.author: ej

customer_reviews.title: Chairmanship
customer_reviews.text: The beautiful details I put it in my living area
customer_reviews.author: Brenda burrell

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t the size I expected (to small) had to order another to make two instead of one
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Taylor

customer_reviews.title: it leaks
customer_reviews.text: wanted to use it for flowers but it leaked like a seive
customer_reviews.author: Emily A Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: A little bit of paint was off but otherwise good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok purchase
customer_reviews.text: They came 2 different tones and one was chipped but not noticeable
customer_reviews.author: Avrionna

customer_reviews.title: Eh. Nothing to write home about.
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice as hoped. Arrived chipped. Colors are good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made arrived with paint chipped the 1st time send it back,however request a 2nd time but still received with chip returning again
customer_reviews.author: theresa llort

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: There was a large run in the glaze. I was going to return it but got busy and waited too long.
customer_reviews.author: iwanawin2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, there were some imperfections but overall I loved this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. ReseBoo

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful vase with earthy colors. LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GORGEOUS vase! I put some lighted branches in it (see attached pic), and I love it. It’s very sturdy, well made, and looks great next to my fireplace. Love this.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: cheap, sturdy, & serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: The paint job is spotty/chippy -- there are places with no paint around the base. The vase itself is irregularly shaped / not symmetrical. However, the base is nice & sturdy so it doesn't tip over easily. I had bought it planning to paint it entirely black so this will work for me, but as-is I'd only use it somewhere in dim light.
customer_reviews.author: trystan

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: These would have been perfect if they were a little bigger. The paint was peeling at the base and it look like it was awkwardly glued together at the base as well. Pretty color and fit with my color scheme
customer_reviews.author: Foxy

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece. I purchased it for a center piece on my table. However I do not think its worth the money I paid. Seen similar vases at Ross. I just decided to keep this one.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Leaky vace
customer_reviews.text: Put water in this vace and it leaked like a sieve. Nothing in the write up mentioned you should not put water in it. Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: william falk

customer_reviews.title: Poor product!
customer_reviews.text: The craftsmanship is very poor. Mine came dented and the product itself is awfully made, nothing like the picture. I returned it. If you would like a nice looking vase, better go to a good store(Pier 1 imports).
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and beautiful! Good quality !!! Will recommend to friends  !!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice vase for flower. Will order again. Recommend this to all my friends
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!  Perfect floor vase.
customer_reviews.text: This vase exceeds my expectations. I sought out a metal vase because I can’t have breakable items sitting on the floor. Amazing value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: L.O.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it seems in picture but dimensions are accurate ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than it seems in picture but dimensions are accurate. I thought the wide part would be wider. Its still a lovely vase.
customer_reviews.author: Metis

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I recently redid my living room and this looks great at the base of my fireplace
customer_reviews.author: Sherri McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect. I kind of laughed at some of the reviews that said it was cheap. Well, yes. $17. I turned a scuffed part to the back. But it looks pretty where I put it, and I din't think anyone will pick it up and inspect it!
customer_reviews.author: Julianna C. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK
customer_reviews.text: It’s not bad for the money. But the picture looks much better then the actual product.
customer_reviews.author: ns

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and Tall
customer_reviews.text: Great edition to my living room! love the color and they're very light weight. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: kaye

customer_reviews.title: I like the vase
customer_reviews.text: It came scratch but I like the vase so I kept it and it went well with my candle table
customer_reviews.author: Eneida

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice vase. A little smaller than I expected but it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to home decor
customer_reviews.text: I really love this vase. It looks even better than photo.
customer_reviews.author: Gena C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's beautiful... it does have a few chips in it... but kinda looks like it belongs there.
customer_reviews.author: L. RIZZO

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, but super cheap quality. Was going to give as a gift but I can't because the paint is chipped everywhere. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: nikkimags

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and pretty vase
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and pretty vase! I have already received SO many compliments on it! It looks very expensive but at a third of the cost of an expensive one!
customer_reviews.author: Jhinderer

customer_reviews.title: It's very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: This vase looks much more expensive than it actually was. It's very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, to put the battery op. lighted branch in, well received and enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: California Girl - LMD

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty color. Looks great in my house with some ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty color. Looks great in my house with some pretty flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Judy B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece - exactly what I was looking for. Very elegant!
customer_reviews.author: Ky

customer_reviews.title: What a joke.
customer_reviews.text: Wow this thing is cheap looking - paint is all scratched off....it does not hold water as noted on the sticker that comes with it. Seems to be made of cheap plastic and it doesn't actually stand up straight.... Want to disappoint someone with a gift, then this may be a good purchase, otherwise stay clear.
customer_reviews.author: Product Auditor

customer_reviews.title: Horrible and Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty but leaks like a sieve, useless as a vase
customer_reviews.author: Scooterific

product_meta.title: Elements Embossed Metal Floral Decorative Vase, 17-Inch - 5154494
product_meta.description: Style Name:Embossed FloralThis Elements 17-Inch metal Harlequin Vase is an elegant and stately focal piece for your home decor. Made of metal, the Vase features an embossed floral pattern in a vivid color palette that will make a bold statement on a shelf, table, or mantel. Measures 17 inches tall.
feature_bullets: Embossed metal harlequin vase will add the perfect touch to any room
Features a lovely embossed Floral pattern
Will look great on a shelf, table or mantel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars362 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
